forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 49, with temperatures falling to around 47 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 13 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain after 1am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 34. West southwest wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Rain then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain before 7am. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 44. West northwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 28. West southwest wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 47, with temperatures falling to around 41 in the afternoon. West wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Cloudy then Slight Chance Snow Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow showers after 4am. Cloudy, with a low around 32. West wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Snow Showers then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow showers before 7am, then patchy fog and a slight chance of snow showers between 7am and 10am. Mostly cloudy. High near 36, with temperatures falling to around 31 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 25. Southwest wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Ski center will be open on 2/22 and 2/23.  Golf course and Shelden Trails are currently groomed.  Ski rentals can be booked ahead https://www.metroparks.com/stony-creek-metropark/#cross-country_skiing.

Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail will have snow added and be groomed for skate and classic skiing today, February 24, 2025 . There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125.  Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails. No trails on the golf course.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: –  Coyote Run and Cedar Trace were last groomed February 22, 2025 for classic ski and skate ski. Due to deteriorating conditions Hawk Hills will not be groomed today.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: The HM website is not correct.  They did groom the entire golf course including hawk hills for skating.  The tracks also look decent with a few grass spots here and there.  It’s great conditions on the skate deck.  I skied from 9-10am

Stoney Creek Metropark (Shelby Township).conditions: Skied Stony Creek late in the afternoon on Friday 2/21.  The Golf Course trails to the East of the parking lot was rolled and classic tracks groomed.  They generally groom early on Saturdays for weekend visitors.  Snow was equal to the best you will see in SE lower MI.  Did not ski the trails in the woods West of the parking lot.The park closes at 8:00 PM, so it might be possible to get in some night skiing.  Warmer temps and rain are coming.  Enjoy Stony Creek NOW>

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nub’s upper Red and Blue loops were SO great  that have no words ??. LF 7

nubsNob.xcTrails: All trails were groomed and tracked on Sunday.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: Today is the MHSAA Division I State Meet. Some of the best high school ski racers in the State will be competing for the state title today. The ski meet will keep Valley, Smokey and Scarface closed for the day. Some rain and snow are expected this morning. The high temperature for the day should reach 40 degrees, softer snow should be expected. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with a deli and an espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 4:30 PM. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
